}} 'Callandra "Cally" Tyrol (nÃ©eCallandra Henderson)' episode "Escape
Velocity"  (also known as 'Cally' or 'Crewman Cally', 'Deckhand Cally', or
'Specialist Cally') is a fictional character from the re-imagined ''Battlestar
Galactica'' series. She is played by actress Nicki Clyne.

Cally works as an air maintenance Specialist on Galactica's flight deck and is
married to her boss, CPO Galen Tyrol.
